org.ocast.sdk.core

Interface DeviceListener


  • public DeviceListener

    Represents a listener of events related to devices and discovery.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  DeviceListener.DefaultImpls
      Represents a listener of events related to devices and discovery.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDeviceDisconnected(Device device, java.lang.Throwable error)
      Tells the listener that a device has been disconnected.
      void onDevicesAdded(java.util.List<? extends org.ocast.sdk.core.Device> devices)
      Tells the listener that one or more devices have been discovered.
      void onDevicesChanged(java.util.List<? extends org.ocast.sdk.core.Device> devices)
      Tells the listener that one or more devices have changed.

      Tells the listener that one or more devices have been lost.

      Tells the listener that the device discovery stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • onDeviceDisconnected

        void onDeviceDisconnected(@NotNull
                          Device device,
                          @Nullable
                          java.lang.Throwable error)

        Tells the listener that a device has been disconnected.

        Parameters:
        device - The disconnected device.
        error - The error that caused the disconnection, or null if the disconnection was initiated by the user.

      • onDevicesAdded

        void onDevicesAdded(@NotNull
                    java.util.List<? extends org.ocast.sdk.core.Device> devices)

        Tells the listener that one or more devices have been discovered.

        Parameters:
        devices - The discovered devices.

      • onDevicesRemoved

        void onDevicesRemoved(@NotNull
                      java.util.List<? extends org.ocast.sdk.core.Device> devices)

        Tells the listener that one or more devices have been lost.

        Parameters:
        devices - The lost devices.

      • onDevicesChanged

        void onDevicesChanged(@NotNull
                      java.util.List<? extends org.ocast.sdk.core.Device> devices)

        Tells the listener that one or more devices have changed.

        Parameters:
        devices - The changed devices.

      • onDiscoveryStopped

        void onDiscoveryStopped(@Nullable
                        java.lang.Throwable error)

        Tells the listener that the device discovery stopped.

        Parameters:
        error - The error, or null is the discovery was stopped by the user.
